name: Loopday
description:
A Birthday Party So Good, You'll Never Want it to End!

Happy Birthday! In Loopday the party never stops! Explore your birthday party, and meet a cast of unique friends all with their own unique problems. You'll have to get through the day or die trying. Be clever and kind, or forceful and rude. Just be aware that there's only one way out... Play your way for as long as you want, or even forever! 

Any bugs with the game will be removed and fixed within the coming weeks. This was the first game jam for several members of the team, so bear with us!

CONTROLS: WASD to move,  Space to interact. 

Team Name: The Loopers

CREDITS:

Mwthecool: Concept, Writing, Pixel Art, Logo

Henzoid: Music, Sound Design

Garlic Bread: Game Design

!Spacebit: Pixel Art

Terranbyte: Pixel Art
